paragraph: Chadron Moore, better known by his stage name Nitti Beatz, is an American record producer who has been active since 2000 and signed to So So Def Recordings from 2005 to 2008.
He was credited as a producer on 8Ball's second album Almost Famous. He did production work on many projects released through Jermaine Dupri's So So Def label.
Most Wanted Presents Live Or Die in G. I w/h Don Vito (1998)
2005: "Dem Boyz" Boyz n da Hood featuring Nitti)
2010: "Bring It Back" (8Ball & MJG featuring Nitti & Young Dro)
